answers.answer: Hi!Yes, an abnormal sensation felt along the course of a nerve is due to neuropathy. It can be diabetes elated in your case. It could also be a pinched spinal nerve in the neck due to wrong posture or working too long on computers etc. You need to keep diabetes under strict control. Also, you can take vitamin B 12 and a multivitamin. Please discuss with your doctor.
